doc.field: 5 binders: 1) Labeled "AUC (All Unit Circulars)-250" includes policy & procedure memos (equipment use, roles of police vs fire depts, etc.), etc from 1980s-90s, again with tearsheets and other inserts to circa 1997, heavily annotated. 2) Labeled "Chief Course" includes "fire tech" promotion course material (1999-2000). 3) Labeled "Battalion Chief Promotion Course" includes test prep/fire tech (1989). 4) Labeled "Lieutenant's Exams, 1986, 1992 (sample test), 1992, 1997": content is as labeled and is a standard package of test prep materials distributed by FDNY as "Previous Lieutenants Exams". 5) Unlabeled binder but appears to have material related to lieutenant promotion course (1997); some lists at front of people promoted or eligible to be promoted (circa 1999).
